column1: So, a little while ago, new guidelines announced. I think they still don't go far enough but inch by inch.....thank God for Dr. Fauci, he is our only hope.Here's the gist of it:"......all Americans including the young and healthy, work to engage in schooling from home when possible; avoid gathering in groups of more than 10 people; avoid discretionary travel; and avoid eating and drinking at bars, restaurants and public food courts...."
Indeed, he’s the guy to listen to. And kudos to the way he stepped in during the briefing this afternoon to clarify a comment made from the podium.
